@Service public class SupportService extends Object
Service for handling general support tickets.

    • deleteSupport

      @CacheEvict(value="support_tickets", key="#tenantId") public void deleteSupport(Long supportId, String tenantId)
      Deletes a support ticket by ID and tenant. Invalidates the tenant cache to reflect deletion.
      Parameters:
      supportId - ID of the support ticket
      tenantId - tenant ID
